# a\(n\) \= \(\(2\*n\+1\)^16 \- 1\)/64\.
https://oeis.org/A359499


## PARI
```PARI
a(n) = ((2*n+1)^16 - 1)/64
```
## Python
```Python
def A359499(n): return ((n<<1)+1)**16-1>>6 # _Chai Wah Wu_, Jan 15 2023
```
